Front Liner & Administrasi Staff Bank BNI Syariah Jobs and Career November 2012

Bank BNI Syariah a new Islamic Banking which broke away from its parent (Spin-Off) as of June 19, 2010, BNI Syariah HR performance and strive to provide the best service to its stake holdernya. With 27 branches and 31 Branch Offices and 15 Division at Head Office, BNI Syariah managed by the number of employees as much as 749 per person in June 2010, is currently (November 2010) has grown to 880 employees that will continue to grow in accordance with business development BNI Syariah .

In developing the competencies and encourage employee performance, in addition to the training given employees were also given the opportunity to perform On the job training which give more overall development opportunities. Demographic composition of BNI Syariah current employees 95% are young workers are very productive.

For mental and spiritual harmony in development, we routinely perform weekly spiritual spray each unit performed both Head Office and Branch Office. Besides routine morning briefing was also conducted before work, which ended with prayer. One more thing that should be maintained is in performing prayers in congregation activities Terminator Back Then both at and outside work time working time. This will continue as we develop our spirit in the work and worship, namely the implementation of the Jamaat as a trustful and work culture BNI Syariah.
